attributes.action: Lower the age limit of tattoos with a parents concent to 16
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I would like the age limit to have a tattoo to remain at 18, BUT lower it to 16 if a parent takes their child to the tattoist and gives their concent

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
